chart.title: Gross domestic product (GDP)
chart.subtitle: This data is adjusted for inflation and differences in the cost of living between countries.
chart.note: This data is expressed in [international-$](#dod:int_dollar_abbreviation) at 2017 prices.

GDP, PPP (constant 2017 international $).descriptionShort: This data is adjusted for inflation and for differences in the cost of living between countries.
descriptionKey: This GDP indicator provides information on economic growth and income levels from 1990.
This data is adjusted for inflation and for differences in the cost of living between countries.
This data is expressed in international-$ at 2017 prices.
